Crimes.Crime_Name: Providing False Information to Immigration Authorities
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board's decision was based on erroneous findings of fact or procedural unfairness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant provided inconsistent statements about brother-in-law's whereabouts, time in Saudi Arabia, and reasons for fleeing Sierra Leone
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Oral testimony, written application, travel documents
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Patently unreasonable standard for credibility findings
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies and omissions in applicant's statements
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Inconsistent information provided during application and hearing
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Patently unreasonable standard for factual findings; correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Standard of review: patently unreasonable for credibility, correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Application_Factor: Conflicting accounts regarding personal history and travel
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Standard_of_Review: Patently unreasonable for credibility; correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubts about applicant's credibility due to inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictory statements about family member's location and travel history
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No objection raised during hearing; questioning order not deemed unfair
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Multiple inconsistencies in testimony and application
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Application for judicial review challenging credibility assessment and fairness
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose or inconsistent reporting of material facts
